title: Offers & Wants Schema
description: A schema to add regenerative economy participants' offers and wants to the Murmurations Index

exchange_type.title: Exchange Type
exchange_type.description: Are you offering ('selling') or wanting ('buying') something?
enumNames: Offer - I have something to lend, lease, sell or donate
Want - I want to borrow, rent, buy or receive something

item_type.title: Item Type
item_type.description: Is it a good (something made) or service (something performed)?
enumNames: Good - a tangible or intangible item to be delivered from the giver to the receiver
Service - a service to be performed by the giver for the receiver

transaction_type.title: Transaction Type
transaction_type.description: On what basis do you want to exchange the item?

enumNames: Borrow/Lend - I want to borrow or lend the item
Rent/Lease - I want to rent or lease the item
Buy/Sell - I want to buy or sell the item
Receive/Donate - I want to receive or donate the item

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Keywords relevant to the good or service you are offering or wanting, searchable in the Murmurations index

title.title: Title
title.description: A few words describing the good or service you are offering or wanting

description.title: Description
description.description: A longer description (1 to 3 sentences) of the good or service you are offering or wanting

image.title: Image
image.description: An image URL (starting with https:// or http://) of the good or service

details_url.title: Item Details URL
details_url.description: A webpage (starting with https:// or http://) with further details about the item you are offering or wanting

geolocation.title: Geolocation
geolocation.description: The geo-coordinates (in decimal format) where the item is available or wanted

geographic_scope.title: Geographic Scope
geographic_scope.description: The geographic scope of the avalability of or wish for the item
enumNames: Local - Within a city or nearby towns
Regional - Within a state, province, or region

contact_details.title: Contact Details
contact_details.description: The contact details for the person or organization offering or wanting the item (fill in at least one)

contact_form.title: Contact Form
contact_form.description: A webpage (starting with https:// or http://) with a contact form that can be used to reach you

expires_at.title: Expires At
expires_at.description: The date and time (e.g., 1651848477, convert dates at <https://www.unixtimestamp.com>) when this offer or want expires

schema.name: offers_wants_schema-v0.1.0
schema.purpose: To map offers and wants within the regenerative economy
